experiences.title: Lead Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: City Storage Systems
workDescription: Led the development and maintenance of websites across the APAC region, with additional support for EMEA region websites.
Utilized React, Gatsby, JavaScript, for front-end development and integrated WordPress and Prismic CMS for content management.
Specialized in converting intricate mockups into functional web components, ensuring responsive and user-friendly site interfaces.
Improved website performance and client engagement through strategic planning and optimization techniques.
Collaborated with global teams, showcasing adaptability and effective communication skills in a fast-paced startup environment.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: BPCL
workDescription: Developed a comprehensive analytical tool to visualize and analyze extensive plant data, enhancing decision-making processes.
Utilized React, NestJS, and PostgreSQL to create a robust full-stack solution that optimized day-to-day information distribution.
Enabled efficient code review, issue debugging, and problem resolution, significantly improving software reliability and performance.
Facilitated direct client interaction, collecting feedback for various project stages to ensure alignment with business objectives.
Contributed to the entire development lifecycle, demonstrating capabilities in both software application engineering and maintenance.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: BPCL
workDescription: Spearheaded the digital transformation of BPCL's paper-based data systems, creating an efficient web application for report management.
Employed React, NestJS, and PostgreSQL to build a full-stack digital solution, streamlining data handling processes.
Collaborated closely with the management team to analyze and digitize existing systems, enhancing operational efficiency.
Played a pivotal role in project planning, requirements gathering, and technical solution development.
Achieved a significant reduction in unchecked errors and operational costs through the implementation of automatic danger checks and data optimization.
